title: The BreakBeat Poets, Vol. 2: Black Girl Magic
description: A BreakBeat Poets anthology to celebrate and canonize the words of Black women across the diaspora.Black Girl Magic continues and deepens the work of the first BreakBeat Poets anthology by focusing on some of the most exciting Black women writing today. This anthology breaks up the myth of hip-hop as a boysâ€™ club, and asserts the truth that the cypher is a feminine form.
author: Mahogany L. Browne
